content: It's possible to locate Shigandang without realizing what he is, as this boss is actually hiding in another Yaoguai King's arena. Travel through the Fright Cliff to Rockrest Flat, and enter the archway to the left to where the Vanguard of Stone") dwells. As you enter, you may notice a large rock that on closer inspection has many carved heads on it. To activate it, you'll need to seek out six statue heads around the Fright Cliff and retrieve their Buddha's Eyeballs:
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Shigandang.md', within the main section titled 'Shigandang', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
It's possible to locate Shigandang without realizing what he is, as this boss is actually hiding in another Yaoguai King's arena. Travel through the Fright Cliff to Rockrest Flat, and enter the archway to the left to where the Vanguard of Stone") dwells. As you enter, you may notice a large rock that on closer inspection has many carved heads on it. To activate it, you'll need to seek out six statue heads around the Fright Cliff and retrieve their Buddha's Eyeballs:
